sourcesContent:
Welcome to the skill based Lottery!

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-welcome-page', templateUrl: './welcome-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./welcome-page.component.css'] }) export class WelcomePageComponent{ categories: any; user: string = ""; category: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { const url = 'http://localhost:5002/kategorien'; this.http.get(url).subscribe((response) => { this.categories = response; }); } startGame() { console.log(this.user); console.log(this.category); if (this.user !== "" && this.category !== "") { // get the selected category and name inputs const date = new Date(); const formattedDateTime = date.toISOString(); const data = { kategorien_id: this.category, spieler: this.user, start: formattedDateTime }; localStorage.setItem('playerdata', JSON.stringify(data)); this.router.navigate(['/quiz']); } else { alert("Please set your name and choose a category!"); } } /*goToQuizPage(){ this.router.navigate(['/quiz']); }*/ }
